RoadUse.description: A directed edge representing vehicles moving from junction A to junction B.

RoadHasJunction.description: A directed edge from each road to all the junctions on that road.

RegionContainsLocation.description: A directed edge from each region to location.

LocationContainsRoad.description: A directed edge from each location to road.

JunctionLocatedAt.description: A directed edge from each junction to its coordinates

Cardinality.description: An entity that is added to every vertex representing the connectivity of the vertex.

JunctionUse.description: An entity on the junction vertex representing the counts of vehicles moving from junction A to junction B.
